verses.roman:
caitanya-maṅgale śrī-vṛndāvana-dāsa
haridāsera guṇa kichu kariyāchena prakāśa

synonyms: caitanya-maṅgale—in the book known as Caitanya-maṅgala (Caitanya-bhāgavata); śrī-vṛndāvana-dāsa—Śrī Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura; haridāsera—of Haridāsa Ṭhākura; guṇa—qualities; kichu—some; kariyāchena prakāśa—manifested.
translation: In Caitanya-maṅgala, Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura has described the attributes of Haridāsa Ṭhākura to some extent.
